title: Jordan Peterson Put Them on Path from Scientific Thinking to Religious Thinking, With Mark Lefebvre
description:
Mark has been an active member of this community with repeated appearances with Mary Kochan talking about parabolic knowledge. I wanted Mark on the channel to introduce himself and talk more about his ideas on parabolic knowing. 

On Mary Kochan's Channel 
First Parabolic convo https://youtu.be/rM8BHpOaKDA
Second parabolic convo https://youtu.be/hHheb1Yxw5o

John Vervaeke makes all of these conversations possible for me and others. Thank you so much John!
Join us on the Awakening From the Meaning Crisis discord, where we have great conversations every day!
https://discord.gg/3TmZCGyQz7

The Meaning Community is our website project to showcase the work of John Vervaeke and hub for all the sites related to addressing the meaning crisis!
https://meaningcommunity.com/ 

Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

Vanderklips channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCX0jIcadtoxELSwehCh5QTg

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/
